channel.title: Coronas on Liisa ∞ Thomas
channel.description: Recent content in Coronas on Liisa ∞ Thomas

item.title: Corona
item.description: The situation regarding the coronavirus is currently under control in Estonia. Since April there have only been single days with more than 10 positive cases detected despite comparatively frequent testing (see here). Most of the restrictions have been lifted by now and events and gatherings are allowed to take place. Of course, we continue to monitor the situation and will update the information on this site regularly. We also hope that by early August rapid coronavirus tests will be available for everyone to use either here or before travelling.
